mapper.select:
SELECT m.equpnm, a.actcd, a.equpcd, sum(comp1) as comp1, sum(comp2) as comp2, sum(comp3) as comp3, sum(comp4) as comp4, sum(comp5) as comp5, sum(comp6) as comp6, sum(comp7) as comp7, sum(comp8) as comp8, sum(comp9) as comp9, sum(comp10) as comp10, sum(comp11) as comp11, sum(comp12) as comp12, sum(a.qty) as qty FROM (SELECT custcd, spjangcd, left(compdate, 6) as compmon, actcd, equpcd, COUNT(equpcd) as qty, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '01' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp1, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '02' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp2, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '03' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp3, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '04' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp4, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '05' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp5, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '06' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp6, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '07' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp7, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '08' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp8, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '09' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp9, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '10' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp10, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '11' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp11, (Case when right(left(compdate, 6),2) = '12' Then count(compdate) ELSE 0 END) as comp12
FROM tb_e411 WHERE left(compdate, 8) BETWEEN #{frdate} and #{todate} AND (actcd = #{actcd} OR #{actcd} = '%') GROUP BY custcd, spjangcd, left(compdate, 6), actcd, equpcd) a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) GROUP BY a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, m.equpnm

SELECT a.plandate as plandate, a.plantime as plantime, c.actnm as actnm, a.equpcd as equpcd, h.equpnm as equpnm, a.gubun as gubun, a.kcpernm as kcpernm, a.qty as qty, a.remark as remark, a.kcspnm as kcspnm FROM TB_E073 a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 h WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = h.custcd AND a.spjangcd = h.spjangcd AND a.actcd = h.actcd AND a.equpcd = h.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 c WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = c.custcd AND a.spjangcd = c.spjangcd AND a.actcd = c.actcd) WHERE left(a.plandate, 6) = CONVERT(varchar(6), DATEADD(m, -0, getdate()), 112) order by a.plandate desc

select a.actcd as actcd, q. actnm as actnm, a.contdate as contdate, Left(a.stdate,4) + '-' + substring(a.stdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.stdate, 7,2) as stdate, Left(a.enddate,4) + '-' + substring(a.enddate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.enddate, 7,2) as enddate from tb_e101 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E018 y WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = y.custcd AND a.spjangcd = y.spjangcd AND a.cls = y.outcd) , (select custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, actcd, max(contdate) as contdate from tb_e101 WITH(NOLOCK) group by custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, actcd) b WHERE a.custcd = b.custcd AND a.spjangcd = b.spjangcd AND a.actcd = b.actcd AND a.contdate =b.contdate AND left(a.enddate,6) = left(CONVERT(varchar(8), GETDATE(),112),6) aND a.contg <> '04' and Len(a.stdate) > 0 order by q. actnm

select a.actcd as actcd, q. actnm as actnm, Left(a.contdate,4) + '-' + substring(a.contdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.contdate, 7,2) as contdate, Left(a.stdate,4) + '-' + substring(a.stdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.stdate, 7,2) as stdate, Left(a.enddate,4) + '-' + substring(a.enddate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.enddate, 7,2) as enddate
from tb_e101 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E018 y WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = y.custcd AND a.spjangcd = y.spjangcd AND a.cls = y.outcd) , (select custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, actcd, max(contdate) as contdate from tb_e101 WITH(NOLOCK) group by custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, actcd) b WHERE a.custcd = b.custcd AND a.spjangcd = b.spjangcd AND a.actcd = b.actcd AND a.contdate =b.contdate AND left(a.enddate,6) = left(CONVERT(varchar(8), DATEADD(DAY, 30, GETDATE()), 112),6) aND a.contg <> '04' and Len(a.stdate) > 0 order by q. actnm

SELECT a.actcd as actcd, a.actnm as actnm, a.equpcd as equpcd, a.equpnm as equpnm, a.pernm as pernm, a.contnm as contnm, a.contents as contents, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,DATEADD(m,-0, GETDATE()),121), 7) + '-01' as stdate, EOMONTH(GETDATE()) as enddate, a.qty as qty FROM (SELECT a.actcd, q.actnm, a.equpcd, m.equpnm, count(a.recedate) as qty, max(a.perid) as perid, d.pernm, max(a.contcd) as contcd, p.contnm, max(convert(varchar(100), a.contents)) as contents, max(a.remark) as remark FROM tb_e401 a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 p WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = p.custcd AND a.spjangcd = p.spjangcd AND a.contcd = p.contcd) WHERE a.recedate BETWEEN replace(LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,DATEADD(m,-0, GETDATE()),121), 7) + '-01', '-', '') AND replace(EOMONTH(GETDATE()),'-','') AND q.actnm like CONCAT('%','%','%') GROUP BY a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, q.actnm, p.contnm, m.equpnm, d.pernm) a WHERE a.qty >= 0 AND a.perid like CONCAT('%','%','%')

SELECT a.actcd as actcd, a.actnm as actnm, a.equpcd as equpcd, a.equpnm as equpnm, a.pernm as pernm, a.contnm as contnm, a.contents as contents, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,DATEADD(m,-0, GETDATE()),121), 7) + '-01' as stdate, EOMONTH(GETDATE()) as enddate, a.qty FROM (SELECT a.actcd, q.actnm, a.equpcd, m.equpnm, count(a.recedate) as qty, max(a.perid) as perid, d.pernm, max(a.contcd) as contcd, p.contnm, max(convert(varchar(100), a.contents)) as contents, max(a.remark) as remark FROM tb_e401 a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 p WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = p.custcd AND a.spjangcd = p.spjangcd AND a.contcd = p.contcd) WHERE a.recedate BETWEEN #{frdate} AND #{todate} AND q.actcd like CONCAT('%',#{actcd},'%') GROUP BY a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, q.actnm, p.contnm, m.equpnm, d.pernm) a WHERE a.qty >= 0 AND a.perid like CONCAT('%','%','%')

select sum(h.qty) as cnt, h.contnm as contnm, h.equpnm as equpnm from (SELECT a.actcd as actcd, a.actnm as actnm, a.equpcd as equpcd, a.equpnm as equpnm, a.pernm as pernm, a.contnm as contnm, a.contents as contents, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,DATEADD(m,-0, GETDATE()),121), 7) + '-01' as stdate, EOMONTH(GETDATE()) as enddate, a.qty FROM (SELECT a.actcd, q.actnm, a.equpcd, m.equpnm, count(a.recedate) as qty, max(a.perid) as perid, d.pernm, max(a.contcd) as contcd, p.contnm, max(convert(varchar(100), a.contents)) as contents, max(a.remark) as remark FROM tb_e401 a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 p WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = p.custcd AND a.spjangcd = p.spjangcd AND a.contcd = p.contcd) WHERE a.recedate BETWEEN #{frdate} AND #{todate} AND q.actcd like CONCAT('%',#{actcd},'%') GROUP BY a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, q.actnm, p.contnm, m.equpnm, d.pernm) a WHERE a.qty >= 0 ) h group by h.equpnm, h.contnm
